===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=ふぐ}}
In light of the older pronunciation ''fuku'',<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> most likely derived from the verb {{m|ja|吹く|tr=fuku||to blow}}, perhaps from the way the fish blow sand to find food.  Alternatively, related to the verb {{m|ja|膨れる|tr=fukureru||to swell up, to expand}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|ふぐ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5}}

* {{ja-l|鰒}}

{{ja-kanjitab|か|とん|yomi=o}}
